channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Got a Pixel 10? Google’s Android Phone Can Now Share Files With Apple’s AirDrop
item.description: You can now share deets (and other digital treats) across the mobile divide.

item.title: The 27 Best Movies on Apple TV, WIRED’s Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Come See Me in the Good Light, Highest 2 Lowest, and The Lost Bus are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV this month.

item.title: The 6 Best Automatic Litter Boxes (2025) Our Cats Would Recommend
item.description: With these high-tech automatic litter boxes, gone are the days of scooping and smells. Welcome to the future.

item.title: Why these founders ditched social ads for Taylor Swift concerts and prison tablets
item.description: Two founders share their stories on how they approached two very different markets: teens in need of well-being advice, and formerly incarcerated indi...

item.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally
item.description: The company sees group chats in ChatGPT as a way for people to coordinate trips, co-write documents, settle debates, or work through research together...

item.title: Salesforce says some of its customers’ data was accessed after Gainsight breach
item.description: Salesforce said it’s investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company Gains...

item.title: This Lightweight Laptop Is Almost Half Off
item.description: Best Buy has the Asus Zenbook A14 marked down to almost half its sticker price.

item.title: Source: Kalshi’s valuation jumps to $11B after raising massive $1B round
item.description: The quickly growing prediction betting market raised fresh capital from Sequoia and CapitalG, according to someone familiar with the deal.

item.title: Swatch’s New OpenAI-Powered Tool Lets You Design Your Own Watch
item.description: The new AI-DADA tool lets you create a unique Swatch design using AI prompts. You can’t make a custom MoonSwatch yet—but it’s not entirely off the tab...

item.title: WhatsApp gets its own Instagram Notes-like feature
item.description: WhatsApp users can now share their status with others through a new "About" feature.
